top_note:
This comprehensive restoration estimate addresses water damage affecting multiple areas of your property, including basement recreation areas, source room, bathroom, utility room, and associated closet space.

Project Scope: Multi-room interior restoration including drywall replacement, flooring installation, trim work, painting, and specialty fixture work across 5 primary locations.
disclaimer:
OVERHEAD:
Professional overhead costs represent the essential business expenses required to deliver quality restoration services, including comprehensive project insurance and bonding coverage, specialized equipment and tool transportation to job sites, regulatory compliance and permit coordination, skilled workforce supervision and quality control oversight, material delivery logistics and inventory management, plus ongoing business operations that ensure reliable service delivery and customer protection throughout the restoration process.

CONTRACTOR PROFIT:
Contractor profit reflects the professional expertise and specialized knowledge required for complex restoration work, assumption of project risks and comprehensive warranty obligations, plus the professional service delivery standards that ensure proper restoration to pre-loss condition with guaranteed workmanship and customer satisfaction.

items.dec: Complete restoration of water-damaged basement recreation areas including drywall installation in affected zones, vinyl plank flooring replacement, comprehensive trim and baseboard installation, plus full painting restoration

items.name: Construction Protection
items.dec: Comprehensive protection measures per OSHA standards to prevent damage to existing finishes and maintain safe work environment

items.name: Install 1/2" Drywall - 2' Height
items.dec: IRC R702.3 installation requirements with cutting allowance for proper joint placement and breakage prevention. Includes 10% waste factor.

items.name: Install 1/2" Drywall - 4' Height
items.dec: IRC R702.3 installation requirements for 4-foot height areas with 10% waste factor for proper installation

items.name: Drywall Tape and Blend - Seam Connection
items.dec: Proper seam treatment for new-to-existing drywall connections per IRC R702.3.8. Includes 10% waste factor.

items.name: Batt Insulation Installation
items.dec: Wall insulation replacement with 5% waste factor for cutting and fitting around framing members and utilities

items.name: Vinyl plank flooring installation
items.dec: Industry standard 10% waste factor for proper plank layout and cutting requirements

items.name: Install 3-1/4" Baseboard
items.dec: Baseboard installation with 10% waste factor for proper fitting and cutting allowance

items.name: Install Quarter Round
items.dec: Quarter round installation with 10% waste factor for proper joint connections

items.name: Door Casing R&R
items.dec: Water damage to door casing requires replacement for proper moisture seal and code compliance

items.name: Recessed Light Detach & Reset
items.dec: Required electrical work to safely disconnect and reconnect electrical fixtures per NEC standards

items.name: Prime Walls and Ceiling
items.dec: Surface preparation and priming with 5% waste factor for proper paint adhesion per IRC R702.3.8

items.name: Paint Walls and Ceiling (2 Coats)
items.dec: Two-coat paint application with 5% waste factor for uniform coverage and finish quality

items.name: Prime and Paint Trim
items.dec: Trim painting with 10% waste factor for proper coverage and finish matching

items.name: Stair Wall Painting - 1st Floor to Basement
items.dec: Water damage restoration of stair wall surfaces connecting 1st floor to basement including proper surface preparation priming and two coats of paint to match existing finish
Complete drywall and ceiling replacement, insulation installation, vinyl plank flooring, three door casing replacements, and comprehensive painting restoration

Project Debris Summary:
- Total estimated construction debris: 1,465 pounds (0.73 tons)
- Recommended container: 10-yard dumpster
- Project duration: 12 working days with 15-day rental period
